title: I Really Didn’t Want to Become a Scumbag - Novel Updates
genre: Adult   Drama   Harem   Mature   Psychological   Romance   School Life
tags: Business Management   Calm Protagonist   Character Growth   Childhood Friends   Childhood Love   Clingy Lover   First Love   Friendship   Love Triangles   Male Protagonist   Management   Modern Day   Multiple POV   Obsessive Love   Office Romance   Parent Complex   Reincarnation   Sentimental Protagonist   Single Parent
author: 周一口鸟
description:
'It's okay to fall in love; however, growing up in a single-parent family, I have no interest in marriage.'

'Damn! I've already said that I'm not getting married, why are you still taking this so seriously?'

'I'm sorry, last night I was drunk.'>
